location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'ROUGH PLAN OF HELMUND RIVER From Band-I-Kamal Khan to Band-I-Sistan (from native information.)'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paperDimensions: 390 x 230 mmFoliation: the map has been foliated with a number written in pencil enclosed in a circle in the top right corner of the recto side of the folio.

mods.abstract: The map shows a stretch of the Helmand River near the disputed frontier between Afghanistan and Persia in Sistan.Imprint: ' I. B. [Intelligence Branch] Topo. Dy. No. 4,516. Exd. C. J. A.'Distinctive features: signed by Major Robert Arthur Edward Benn, HBM Vice Consul, Seistan and Kain, Seistan, 19 September 1902; discriminates between dry riverbed (shown in light brown) and water (shown in blue).
